main event: A bright aluminum-colored object was sighted at Eglin Air Force Base on 15 April 1957.
interesting points: The observers initially thought the object was a drag parachute but quickly realized it was not,The object increased in speed to an estimated Mach 2 or 3 before disappearing from sight,The object was described as being approximately the size of a 50 cent piece when viewed at arm's length,No sound or exhaust was observed coming from the object,The sighting lasted for about 15 seconds before the object accelerated out of sight.
witness description: civilians from police departments in Port Walton Beach and Eglin Air Force Base
